name: honeysuckle
description:
honeysuckle is a game about backyard friendships and growing up.

the dialogue is unique to each playthrough, so try revisiting the game two or three times to catch it all!

music by robby kraft (@robbykraft). design, programming, and art by rachel simone weil (@partytimehxlnt). made in a few days for femicom game jam #1: here's to theresa duncan.
